meanings.definition: A place where goods are sold.
meanings.sent1: The dealerships in town offer a variety of products.
meanings.sent2: I need to visit the dealerships to buy a new car.
meanings.sent3: The dealerships were so crowded that it felt like a marketplace!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the best product at the dealerships of happiness.
meanings.sent5: The neon lights of the dealerships shone brightly in the night.

meanings.sent1: He works in the dealerships and enjoys helping customers.
meanings.sent2: Competition among dealerships can lead to better prices for consumers.
meanings.sent3: The dealerships were booming, making money rain from the sky!
meanings.sent4: In the game of commerce, the dealerships were the knights in shining armor.
meanings.sent5: The success of the dealerships was like a symphony of sales.
